resources.string:
Welcome to FRC-Scouting! 

 This app was developed by me (Nathan) to send scouting data to our SQL database over Bluetooth. If at any point while using the app you have a question feel free to contact me. 

 To report a bug with this app go to https://github.com/IBXCODECAT/FRC-Scouting/issues and open an Issue. 

 I genuinely hope that the FIRST robotics 2022 season goes well for you all and that you all have a great time at competition! 

 Tap "Let's Go!" bellow to start entering data!
You did the thing! Thank you for helping with data collection!
There was a problem sending your data... It\'s probably our fault, but please check your Bluetooth connection and try again!
